response.job_title: Machine Learning | Data Science | Data Architecture | Data Engineering | Project Management | Azure | Prompt Engineering
response.summary:
Professional with a decade of experience in Business Analytics, specializing in Machine Learning and Deep Learning technologies. Proficient in PMI methodology for project management, CRISP-DM for advanced data analysis, and DAMA for Data Governance. Exceptional skills in handling and analyzing large data sets, coupled with a proven track record of leading Agile projects.

Abilities for leadership of agile projects: shield the team of distractions and interferences, enforcing rules for ensuring the correct use of the scrum process, removing impediments, servant leader, negotiation skills, teams leadership, active listening, adaptation to change and teamwork.

************* Machine Learning *************
- Deep learning:  Multilayer Perceptron, Convolutional Neural Network, Autoencoders, Recurrent Neural Networks, Transfer Learning, Fine Tuning
- Classification: Decision Trees, K-NN, Naïve Bayes, Random Forest, Neural Networks, Logistic Regression, SVM.
- Ensemble: Voting (Hard, Soft), Boosting (XGBoost, LightGBM, CatBoost), Bagging, Stacking, 
- Clustering: K-means, DBSCAN, Agglomerative clustering.
- Regression: Linear, Lasso, Ridge.
- Association rules: FP-Growth
- Validation: split validation and cross validation.
- Data preparation: one hot encoding, normalization, binning, feature selection, data cleaning.
- Text mining: remove stop words, tokenization, stemming, lemmatization, TF-IDF, sentiment analysis, 
- Hyperparameters tuning: grid search

*************Technical Skills ****************

- Data mining and machine learning tools like: Scikit-Learn (Python), Anaconda Framework,  Rapiminer, Rapidminer Server, Weka, Watson Analytics and SPSS.
- Notebooks: Colab, Jupyther, Zeppelin.
- Cloudera (Big data): hive, impala, sqoop, PySpark, SparkML, SparkSQL.
- Hortonworks:  Ambari, YARN, PySpark
- Design and management of database in SAP IQ, MySQL, PostgreSQL and Oracle engines.
- Data modeling in tools like: SAP Power Designer, Vertabelo.
- Data preparation tools like: Pandas (Python), SAP Data Services, Pentaho Data Integration.
- Data visualization in Tableau, Power BI, TIBCO Spotfire and D3.js.
- Deep Learning: Keras
- Text mining in rapidminer and NLTK (Python).
- Git tools: GitHub, BitBucket, GitKraken
- Code editors: Notepad++, Visual Studio Code, PyCharm
- Boards: Trello, Planner, Azure DevOps, Jira
- AWS: EC2, S3, RDS, EFS, Lambda, Dynamo, IAM, CloudFront.
- GCP: Compute Engine
- Azure: SqlServer, Azure Data Factory, HDInsights, Data Lake Storage V2, Azure Databricks, Azure Synapse
response.skills: Azure Open AI, Big Data, Project Management, Data Science, Deep Learning, Machine Learning, Business Intelligence, Microsoft Azure, Azure Synapse, Azure Data Lake, Scrum, Git, Gestión de proyectos, Data Mining, Python, Linux, Ingeniería de software, Database Design, Software Engineering, Business strategy

profile_positions.description:
ChatGPT Data Integration Specialist will be responsible for developing an application that populates databases using unstructured information processed through ChatGPT. The role involves leveraging Azure OpenAI technologies, Azure Data Lake, and Python to create a robust, scalable, and efficient data integration solution.

-   Application Development: Design and develop an application that utilizes ChatGPT to extract and process unstructured data for database population.
-   Azure OpenAI Integration: Integrate Azure OpenAI technologies to enable advanced natural language processing and data extraction capabilities in the application.
-   Data Lake Management: Utilize Azure Data Lake for storing and managing both structured and unstructured data efficiently.
-   Data Transformation: Implement data transformation logic in Python to convert unstructured data into a format suitable for database storage.
-   Security: Implement security best practices to protect sensitive data and ensure compliance with data privacy regulations.
-   Documentation: Create comprehensive documentation for the application, including architecture diagrams, code comments, and user manuals.
-   Team Collaboration: Work closely with other team members, including data engineers and data scientists, to ensure the application aligns with overall project goals.
profile_positions.title: Data Architect - AI Hub

profile_positions.description:
- Data Processing Best Practices: Spearheaded the formulation and implementation of industry-standard best practices for efficient and secure data processing, ensuring data integrity and quality.
- Tool Exploration and POCs: Conducted comprehensive research and developed proof-of-concept implementations for various data processing tools, including Alteryx, Kafka/Confluent, Synapse, SQL Pools, Spark Pools, Polybase, and Event-Driven Architectures. This enabled the team to make data-driven decisions on tool selection.
- DevOps Coordination: Collaborated closely with an external DevOps specialist to optimize the use of infrastructure resources, ensuring seamless deployment and scalability.
- Database and Modeling Guidelines: Authored comprehensive documentation outlining best practices for database object naming, dimensional modeling, Power BI (PBI) modeling, and role assignments in PBI, thereby standardizing procedures and improving team efficiency.
- Power BI Manuals: Created user-friendly manuals detailing the steps for connecting to and utilizing Power BI, enhancing user adoption and reducing the learning curve.
- Helix Platform Integration: Engaged with the newly-released Helix platform (launched in April 2023) to understand its data model, architecture, and interaction patterns for the PBIOnHelix project. This ensured a smooth integration process.
- Helix Dashboard Development: Developed and documented a proof-of-concept that demonstrated the connection, data preparation, and dashboard utilization using information from the Helix platform, providing a blueprint for future implementations.
•	Build Artifacts for Regional Initiatives: Led the creation of build artifacts to assess and accelerate in-house software development initiatives. This involved evaluating software performance, scalability, and security features and acceleration cost estimation
profile_positions.title: Data Architect - Federated Development

profile_positions.description:
- Assisted in the seamless migration and development of Spark processes from HDInsights to Databricks, optimizing for performance and scalability.
- Engineered and optimized Spark processes using Jupyter and Zeppelin within the HDInsights environment, enhancing data processing capabilities.
- Spearheaded the creation and ongoing maintenance of robust data pipelines in Azure Data Factory, ensuring seamless data flow and integration.
- Provided expert-level support in maintaining and updating sensitive data within the Azure Key Vault service, bolstering security measures.
- Contributed to data administration tasks in Data Lake Storage, focusing on data integrity, accessibility, and compliance.
- Conducted rigorous quality reviews of cryptocurrency data, validating its accuracy and reliability for subsequent analytics and reporting.
- Administered and developed SQL Server databases in Azure, implementing best practices for data management and performance optimization.
- Facilitated the migration of data from Parquet files to Delta Lake format, enhancing data storage efficiency and query performance.
- Engaged in SCRUM ceremonies as an active team member, collaborating on project milestones and contributing to agile development processes.
profile_positions.title: Data Architect - Block Chain Analyzer

profile_positions.description:
- Designed and implemented comprehensive Machine Learning labs using scikit-learn, covering a wide array of algorithms and techniques such as Linear and Polynomial Regression, Logistic Regression, Lasso and Ridge Regularization, Hyperparameter Tuning via Grid Search, Support Vector Machines (SVM), Naive Bayes, and Ensemble Methods.

- Created in-depth Deep Learning labs utilizing Keras, focusing on advanced neural network architectures including Multilayer Perceptrons, Convolutional Neural Networks, Autoencoders, Recurrent Neural Networks, as well as specialized topics like Transfer Learning and Fine-Tuning.

- Responsible for grading and providing constructive feedback for postgraduate-level labs in the Machine Learning Techniques (specialized Deep Learning summer course).

profile_positions.location: Research Group Society, Economy and Productivity (SEPRO) - Bogotá D.C., Colombia
profile_positions.description:
CRISP - DM | Rapidminer | Data integration | Predictive models | Descriptive models | Data mining | Transport

1. Develop a prototype system of analysis and prediction of the Colombian cargo transport operation using technical data mining, for support in decision making and public policy formulation.
a. Construct a data set of the Colombian automotive cargo transport operation, appropriate for the training and validation of descriptive and predictive models of data mining techniques.
b. Design, elaborate and evaluate a descriptive model of the Colombian automotive cargo transport operation, based on data mining techniques, to determine the current behavior of the system.
c. Design, elaborate and evaluate a predictive model, based on data mining techniques, to estimate the behavior of the Colombian automotive cargo transport operation.
d. Develop the system of analysis and prediction, systematically evaluate it with current data, to determine the quality of the information thrown.
e. To evaluate the utility of the results produced by the models for the decision making and the formulation of public policies in the Colombian land freight transport sector.

2. Project management using the CRISP-DM 1.0 methodology.

3. Researcher in the topic of Logistic Information Systems, assembly and administrator of the documentary repository in Alfresco, web development of the research group page.

company.name: Globant
company.description:
We are a digitally native company that helps organizations reinvent themselves to create a way forward and unleash their potential. We are the place where innovation, design and engineering meet scale.

- We have more than 27,000 employees and we are present in 25 countries working for companies like Google, Rockwell Automation, Electronic Arts and Santander, among others.

- We were also featured as a business case study at Harvard, MIT, and Stanford.

- We were named a Worldwide Leader in CX Improvement Services by IDC MarketScape report.

- We are a member of the Cybersecurity Tech Accord.

- At Globant, we believe that an inclusive culture and a diverse environment make us stronger. We are an equal opportunity employer (EOE M/F/D/V), always seeking to generate a place for inspiration and growth for everyone regardless of race, color, religion, national origin, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability, gender identity, or veteran status.

- Our ultimate Diversity & Inclusion goal is to make Globant a respectful, safe, and inclusive workplace for all Globers where gender equality, cultural diversity, and inclusion are core to our DNA. 


For more information, visit https://bit.ly/globant_com
